numbered_ace_sentences: 2. Young women tend to reach out more than young men across all categories.
4. The ease of communication can increase.
5. If the ease of communication increases, then the effort decreases.
6. If the ease of communication increases, then the time decreases.
7. If the ease of communication increases, then the percentage of young people who reach out increases.
8. I wonder why disparities between genders exist.
10. I try to contact my parents frequently.
11. I contact my parents via text.
12. I contact my parents via FaceTime.
13. Many college students are out of state.
14. If a college student is out of state, then the college student does not see the parents often.
15. A title could be "Parental communication: disconnecting to connect".
